name: Ricochet (itch) (ben657)
description:
Ricochet

Ricochet is a 2D puzzler with a competitive edge.

You and another very minimal shooter are pitted against each other to work out the right (or just quickest) way to get your one and only bullet to the other side and hit the other shooter.

As you progress, the levels will become more and more tricky with extra wall types like portals and spinners!

Controls

Left analogue stick - Aim

Right trigger - Fire

Bugs

Occasionally the game won't load into the first level correctly, please refresh the browser to fix this.
